returns._0: The AssetRecord struct associated with the CID.

params.owner: The address of the owner to query.

returns._0: An array of Filecoin CIDs registered by the owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._paymentNonce: A unique identifier for this specific payment attempt (provided by frontend).
params._serviceType: Identifier for the service being paid for (e.g., "TRAINING").

registerAsset(address,string,string,stri.details: Only callable by the contract owner (expected to be the backend service wallet).

params.filecoinCid: The primary Filecoin CID for the asset (must be unique).
params.name: Optional name for the asset.
params.ownerAddress: The original user/owner initiating the action via the backend.
params.sourceAssetCid: Optional CID for the source asset (e.g., dataset for a model).

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setServiceFee(uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner.

params._newFee: The new service fee in wei.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawFees().details: Only callable by the contract owner.

getAssetByCid(string).notice: Retrieves the full provenance record for a given Filecoin CID.

getAssetsByOwner(address).notice: Retrieves the list of Filecoin CIDs registered by a specific owner address.

payForService(string,string).notice: Allows a user to pay the required service fee.

registerAsset(address,string,string,stri.notice: Registers provenance information for a new asset.

setServiceFee(uint256).notice: Sets the required fee for payable services.

withdrawFees().notice: Allows the owner to withdraw accumulated service fees.
